description: Defines the Staff model class with fields, constructor, and serialization methods for a kindergarten management system frontend.

classes.name: Staff
classes.description: A data model representing staff members with id, name, role, and email, including serialization methods.

methods.name: fullName
methods.description: A getter that returns the full name of the staff member by concatenating first and last names.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: A factory constructor that creates a Staff instance from a map, typically parsed from JSON.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Staff instance into a map suitable for serialization, such as to JSON.
